description: This source file provides utility functions for LAN management, including extracting MAC addresses from IPv6 addresses and handling parameter change signals within a network device management context. It also contains helper functions to clone strings and manage memory.

methods.name: LanManager_ParamValueChanged
methods.description: Handles value change signals for specific DHCPv4 and DHCPv6 parameters, triggering host polling when changes are detected.

methods.name: LanManager_GetMACAddrFromIPv6Addr
methods.description: Derives a MAC address from an IPv6 address based on RFC4291 unless the address does not contain a MAC-derived interface ID, in which case it returns the interface ID.

methods.name: LanManager_GetMACAddrFromIPv6LinkLocalAddr
methods.description: Derives a MAC address from a link-local IPv6 address if it conforms to RFC4291 and the address's interface ID is derived from a MAC address.

methods.name: void LanManager_CheckCloneCopy(char ** dest,const char * src)
methods.description: Safely clones a string from source to destination with memory management, avoiding overwriting or unnecessary reallocations.
